name: kpi-diploma-typescript-config
description: Common configuration files used across projects.

scripts.start: echo info: no start script for this package... no worries... this is normal
scripts.check-version-collision: [ "$(npm view .@latest version)" != $npm_package_version ] && exit 0 || echo "Error: package version '$npm_package_version' already published, please run (p)npm version before merge " && exit 1
scripts.version: npm run format && git add -A src
scripts.version:dependabot: git checkout HEAD -- .npmrc && pnpm version patch
